chapter.text: 51|1|Sapatha [1] dhulijhanjhara
51|2|atahpara bojhabahanakari meghapunjera
51|3|atahpara sbacchandagati nauyanera
51|4|atahpara nirdesa bantanakari pheresataganera
51|5|tomaderake pradatta pratisruti abasya'i satya.
51|6|Niscaya pratidana abasyambhabi.
51|7|Sapatha bahu pathabisista asamanera [1]
51|8|niscaya tomara paraspara birodhi kathaya lipta [1].
51|9|Phiriye rakha haya ta theke ye phire thake [1].
51|10|Dhbansa hoka mithyacarira [1]
51|11|yara sandeha-sansaye nipatita, udasina
51|12|tara jijnesa kare, ‘pratidana dibasa kabe habe?’
51|13|‘Ye dina tara agune sajaprapta habe.’
51|14|Bala habe ‘tomara tomadera sasti [1] asbadana kara, tomara e sasti'i tbaranbita karate ceyechile.’
51|15|Niscaya muttakira thakabe jannatasamuhe o jharnadharaya
51|16|Grahana karabe ta ya tadera raba taderake dibena; niscaya itopurbe tara chila satkarmasila
51|17|tara ratera saman'ya ansa'i atibahita karata nidraya [1]
51|18|ara ratera sesa prahare tara ksama prarthana karata [1]
51|19|ara tadera dhana–sampade rayeche bhiksuka o bancitera haka [1].
51|20|Ara niscita bisbasidera jan'ya nidarsanasamuha rayeche yamine [1]
51|21|ebam tomadera nijedera madhye'o. Tabu'o tomara ki caksusmana habe na
51|22|ara asamane rayeche tomadera riyika o pratisruta saba kichu [1].
51|23|Ata'eba, asamana o yaminera rabera sapatha! Niscaya tomara ye katha bale thaka tara mata'i eti satya [1].
51|24|Apanara kache ibarahimera sam'manita mehamanadera brttanta eseche ki
51|25|yakhana tara tara kache upasthita haye balala, ‘salama’. Uttare tini balalena, ‘salama’. Era to aparicita loka [1].
51|26|Atahpara ibarahima tara strira kache druta cupisare gelena [1] ebam ekati mota-taja go-bachura (bhaja) niye asalena
51|27|atahpara tini ta tadera samane rekhe balalena, ‘tomara ki khabe na?’
51|28|Ete tadera samparke tara mane bhitira sancara hala [1]. Tara balala, ‘bhita habena na.’ Ara tara take eka jnani putra santanera susambada dila.
51|29|Takhana tara stri citkara karate karate sam'mukhe asala ebam tara gala capariye balala, ‘brd'dha-bandhya’ [1]
51|30|tara balala, ‘apanara raba erupa'i balechena; niscaya tini prajnamaya, sarbajna.
51|31|Ibarahima balalena, ‘he prerita pheresatagana! Tomadera bisesa kaja [1] ki?’
51|32|Tara balala, ‘niscaya amara eka aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi.
51|33|Yate tadera upara niksepa kari matira sakta dhela
51|34|ya simalanghanakaridera jan'ya cihnita apanara rabera kacha theke [1].’
51|35|Atahpara sekhane yesaba mumina chila amara taderake bera kare niye asalama.
51|36|Tabe amara sekhane ekati paribara chara ara kono musalima pa'ini.
51|37|Ara yara marmambhada sastike bhaya kare amara tadera jan'ya okhane ekati nidarsana rekhechi.
51|38|Ara nidarsana rekhechi musara brttante'o, yakhana amara take spasta pramanasaha phira’a'unera kache pathalama [1]
51|39|takhana se ksamatara ahankare mukha phiriye nila [1] ebam balala, ‘e byakti haya eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada.’
51|40|Kaje'i amara take o tara dalabalake sasti dilama ebam tadera sagare niksepa karalama, ara se chila tiraskrta.
51|41|Ara nidarsana rayeche ‘adera ghatanate'o, yakhana amara tadera birud'dhe prerana karechilama akalyanakara bayu [1]
51|42|eta ya kichura upara diye baye giyechila take'i yena parinata karala curna-bicurna dhbansastupe.
51|43|Ara'o nidarsana rayeche samudera brttante'o, yakhana taderake bala hayechila, ‘bhoga kare na'o ekati nidrsta kala.’
51|44|Atahpara tara tadera rabera adesa manate ahankara karala; phale taderake pakara'o karala bajra [1] ebam tara ta dekhachila.
51|45|Atahpara tara uthe damrate parala na ebam pratirodha karate'o parala na.
51|46|Ara (dhbansa karechilama) edera age nuhera sampradayake, niscaya tara chila phaseka sampradaya.
51|47|Ara asamana amara ta nirmana karechi amadera ksamata bale [1] ebam amara niscaya'i mahasamprasaranakari [2].
51|48|Ara yamina, amara take bichiye diyechi, atahpara kata sundara byabasthapanakari [1] (amara)
51|49|ara pratyeka bastu amara srsti karechi joraya joraya [1], yate tomara upadesa grahana kara.
51|50|Ata'eba, tomara allahara dike dhabita ha'o [1]. Niscaya ami tomadera prati allahara paksa theke eka spasta satarkakari [2].
51|51|Ara tomara allahara sathe kono ilah‌ sthira karo na; ami tomadera prati allaha prerita eka spasta satarkakari.
51|52|Ebhabe tadera purbabatidera kache yakhana'i kono rasula esechena tara'i take baleche, ’e to eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada!’
51|53|Tara ki eke aparake e mantrana'i diye eseche? Baram era simalajayanakari sampradaya [1].
51|54|Kaje'i apani taderake upeksa karuna, ete apani tiraskrta habena na.
51|55|Ara apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana niscaya upadesa muminadera upakare ase.
51|56|Ara ami srsti karechi jina ebam manusake ejan'ye'i ye, tara kebala amara ibadata karabe.
51|57|Ami tadera kacha theke kono riyika ca'i na ebam eta'o ca'i na ye, tara amake kha'oyabe [1].
51|58|Niscaya allaha, tini'i to riyikadata, prabala saktidhara, parakramasali.
51|59|Sutaram yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche tadera samamatabalambidera anurupa prapya (sasti). Kaje'i tara etara jan'ya amara kache yena tarahuro na kare [1].
51|60|Ata'eba, yara kuphari kareche tadera jan'ya durbhoga se dinera, ye dinera bisaye taderake satarka kara hayeche.
